participant_1.name: Mike
participant_1.personality: Friendly and supportive, always eager to help others, especially kids in sports.
participant_1.background: Coffee is my preferred beverage. I coach little league baseball. I have five sons. I drive a mini van. I also like a glass of wine in the evenings.

participant_2.name: Samantha
participant_2.personality: Energetic and sociable, with a strong passion for academics and nightlife.
participant_2.background: I graduated from Yale in 2011 with a degree in finance. I grew up in Manhattan. I drive a BMW. My parents are very wealthy bankers.

content.text: Nice to see you! I like to play baseball and play baseball
I love the night time. I am in college.
What do you think about ConvAI competition?
Hey, listen. I love the night time. I am in college.
